name: Paradis
description:
This is a small and short walking simulator where you get to collect 14 letters, and unlock music tracks along the way.

At first this was a school project, and I decided to upload it here.

CONTROLS :

Move : WASD and mouse

Jump : Spacebar

Interact with the characters or the radio : Left Click

Change the music pitch : Mouse Wheel

Reset the music pitch : Middle Mouse

Exit the game : Escape and Backspace (Only Backspace while in the menu)

SOUNDTRACK

Get the album on Bandcamp! https://davidoux.bandcamp.com/album/paradis-ost

KNOW ISSUES :

The camera can sometimes act a little funky in the beginning.
